text: Mikhail Saakashvili (; born December 21, 1967) is a Georgian politician. He was the President of Georgia. As of 2020, he was head of the National Reform Council of Ukraine. In October 2021, Mikheil Saakashvili, was arrested after returning illegally to his country, after being in exile outside Georgia since 2013. A gesture he explained by his willingness to fight alongside his compatriots in the country. Right now, the Georgian ex-president is in jail and in a very bad position. Doctors have found that he has been poisoned and the Georgian government does not let him go to the jury. Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Georgia Category:Politicians from Tbilisi
title: Mikheil Saakashvili
